description: In this short talk I would like to present SDKMAN, a command line tool to easily manage and switch between Java version. With the help of this little tool, the developer can easily download various versions/distributions of Java and Java related SDKs (such as Kotlin, Spring Boot, Scala, Maven). In the slides, I will show how to install the tool and explain the most common use cases.
title: SDKMAN: A little tool to switch between Java versions
